name: Cargo
headline: Build your GTM workforce
description: We’re redefining how teams execute GTM by making them leaner, faster and engineer-driven. In an AI-first world, we’re replacing SDR-heavy models with a hybrid approach, empowering full-cycle AEs through a blend of manual effort and automation.

founders.name: Aurelien Aubert, Founder
founders.description: +10y of experience in data & growth engineering - ex Spendesk (french unicorn)

founders.name: Maxence De Villepion, Founder
founders.description: 10 years xp in generating revenue for fast-growing companies (among them: 2 unicorns: Ledger and Spendesk)

# Build AI workflows that drive revenue
Orchestrate all your go-to-market operations from one single hub.Aggregate, enrich, and sync only golden records to your CRM, at the right time.
[Get started](https://getcargo.io/<https:/app.getcargo.io>)Talk to a GTM engineer
They're already building with us

[OrchestrationEnrich, score, assign and route leads seamlessly. Cut by half outbound admin time.MarketingSalesCustomer Success![orchestration-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/orchestration-bento-mobile.svg)![orchestration-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/orchestration-bento.svg)](https://getcargo.io/</product/orchestration>)
[StorageIntegrate and unify your data in one place![storage-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/storage-table-mobile.svg)![storage-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/storage-table.svg)](https://getcargo.io/</product/storage>)
[Coming soon...ReportingMonitor workflow activities, understand your impact![reporting-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/reporting-chart-mobile.svg)![reporting-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/reporting-chart.svg)](https://getcargo.io/</product/reporting>)
[AIEmpower sales reps with AI to boost sales efficiency![ai-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/ai-prompt-mobile.svg)![ai-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/ai-prompt.svg)](https://getcargo.io/</product/ai>)
[SegmentationBuild dynamic audiencesin minutes![ai-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/segmentation-mobile.svg)![ai-bento](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/segmentation.svg)](https://getcargo.io/</product/segmentation>)
## What can you implement with Cargo?
Streamline your sales process to close more deals and free up sales reps time on what truly matters.
[See all templates](https://getcargo.io/</templates>)
[Track job offers at target accounts![Thomas](https://getcargo.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.getcargo.io%2Fv1%2Forchestration%2Ftemplates%2Fjob-offers%2Fdocumentation%2Fauthor.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)Thomas@Datachimp](https://getcargo.io/</templates/job-offers>)[Merge duplicate companies in the CRM![Pallavi](https://getcargo.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.getcargo.io%2Fv1%2Forchestration%2Ftemplates%2Fcrm-deduplication%2Fdocumentation%2Fauthor.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)Pallavi@Spotdraft](https://getcargo.io/</templates/crm-deduplication>)[Extract and score multiple stakeholders at MQAs![Sami](https://getcargo.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.getcargo.io%2Fv1%2Forchestration%2Ftemplates%2Fstakeholder-buckets-extraction%2Fdocumentation%2Fauthor.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)Sami@Datadome](https://getcargo.io/</templates/stakeholder-buckets-extraction>)
## Make all your GTM stack sing together with our native integrations
Cargo is integrated with 50+ revenue providers.
[See all integrations](https://getcargo.io/</integrations>)

## Who benefits from Cargo?
![growth-teams](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/growth-teams.svg)Growth teams
Automate outbound admin and help your sales reps focus solely on selling
![rev-ops-team](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/rev-ops-team.svg)RevOps Teams
Orchestrate all your go-to-market operations from a single hub
![sales-reps](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/sales-reps.svg)Sales Reps
Enable sales teams to focus only on the accounts that matter.
![square-cargo-logo](https://getcargo.io/static/img/logos/logo-cargo-square.svg)
## Empowered by our Users
We can't explain ourselves like they do! Hear what they have to say.
![Guillaume Cabane](https://getcargo.io/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimg%2Favatars%2Fguillaume-cabane.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
Guillaume CabaneCo-Founder @HyperGrowth
Essential. Innovative. Indispensable. Cargo let you build your unique growth engine — a much-needed solution in the market today.
![Frederic Pinchon](https://getcargo.io/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimg%2Favatars%2Ffrederic-pinchon.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
Frederic PinchonDirector of RevOps @Weights & Biases
Cargo helps me to independently drive projects from ideation to execution, delivering tangible results within days without involving our infrastructure team.
![Karl Rafidimanan](https://getcargo.io/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimg%2Favatars%2Fkarl-rafidimanana.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
Karl RafidimananGTM @Elba
Imagine taking the best of n8n / Make with Snowflake's ability to manage data. That's what Cargo does, making it a powerhouse for the operations team
![grid-square-full](https://getcargo.io/static/img/pictures/grid-square-full.svg)
## Engineer your growth now
Set the new standard in revenue orchestration. Start creating playbooks to fast-track your revenue growth.
[Get started](https://getcargo.io/<https:/app.getcargo.io>)Talk to a GTM engineer

generated_description:
Cargo is a fresh startup founded in 2023 and is currently a part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, based in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco. With a small yet focused team of six employees, Cargo is on a mission: "Build your GTM (Go-To-Market) workforce." 

At its core, Cargo is reimagining how teams execute their go-to-market strategies. Gone are the days dominated by sales development representatives (SDRs); Cargo is ushering in an AI-first approach. They advocate for a hybrid model that empowers full-cycle Account Executives (AEs) through a blend of manual effort and cutting-edge automation. This means businesses can be leaner, faster, and more innovation-driven.

Here’s what you need to know about what Cargo offers:

1. **Revenue Orchestration**: Cargo provides tools to streamline all go-to-market operations from a single platform, allowing teams to aggregate and enrich data seamlessly. Their service cuts outbound administrative tasks in half, freeing up valuable time for sales reps to focus on closing deals rather than drowning in paperwork.

2. **AI Empowerment**: The platform incorporates AI to enhance sales efficiency, enabling sales reps to zero in on the most promising accounts. They facilitate the creation of customized workflows and playbooks that help teams execute their strategies more effectively.

3. **Integrations Galore**: Cargo plays well with others, boasting over 50 integrations with key revenue providers, including CRM giants like Salesforce and marketing platforms like HubSpot and Slack.

4. **User Testimonials**: Existing users, from growth teams to RevOps teams, sing praises about how Cargo transforms their operations. Users report being able to drive projects independently, achieve quick results, and essentially turn their data management processes into cohesive powerhouses.

5. **Resources and Community**: Their website offers a wealth of resources, from customer stories to dozens of pre-built templates that guide users in maximizing their Cargo experience and ensuring smooth integration with existing workflows.

In a nutshell, if you're part of a sales team looking to innovate your GTM approach in an efficient, automated way, Cargo might just be your new best friend. They aim not just to optimize operations but to redefine what it means to be agile in an ever-evolving market landscape. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [getcargo.io](https://getcargo.io).
